summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Traffic Code, amending Section 11.76.005 of the Seattle Municipal Code to clarify pay station receipt display instructions and establish a limit on the number of parking pay station receipts a vehicle may display, and amending Section 11.31.121 of the Seattle Municipal Code to lower the monetary penalty for improper receipt display, and amending Section 11.76.015 of the Seattle Municipal Code to clarify that this section does not apply to improperly displayed parking pay station receipts.
